entry.title: Cool Hover Effects That Use Background Properties
entry.summary: A while ago, Geoff wrote an article about a cool hover effect. The effect relies on a combination of CSS pseudo-elements, transforms, and transitions. A lot of comments have shown that the same effect can be done using background ‚Ä¶ Cool Hover Effects That Use Background Properties originally published on CSS-Tricks. You should get the newsletter.
